name: 洪子晏
objective:
本課程聚焦於進化計算方法、模擬退火法、遺傳演算法、蟻群優化法和粒子群優化等啟發式演算法之介紹，以及演算法於經典最佳化問題之應用，並以管理科學之實務案例討論演算法之應用。
This course focuses on the introduction to heuristic and metaheuristic algorithms, including Evolutionary Computation, Simulated Annealing (SA), Genetic Algorithm (GA), Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) and Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), and their application in well-known optimization problems. Case studies for a variety of problems will also be discussed.
